text.div:
CystTypesVs ValueSet

Cyst Types Current terminology for this value set has not been specified, but the terminology selected will include terminology values with the following meanings. | Code | Meaning | |:-------------|:-----| ComplexCyst | A 'complex' or 'complicated' breast cyst, refers to cysts that contain something besides clear fluid ComplicatedCyst | A 'complex' or 'complicated' breast cyst, refers to cysts that contain something besides clear fluid CystWithDebris | CystWithDebris MicroCyst | A 'Microcyst' on the other hand, is very small, often less than 2-3 mm. They will only show up on a mammogram or ultrasound, and, they often occur in clusters. Breast clustered microcysts are quite common, estimated to appear in around 6%% of all breast ultrasound scans OilCyst | Breast oil cysts are benign breast lumps that usually don't require treatment. SimpleCyst | The cyst usually contains only fluid, and it is surrounded by a very thin wall.

name: CystTypesVs
title: CystTypesVs
description:
Cyst Types


Current terminology for this value set has not been specified, but the terminology selected
will include terminology values with the following meanings.

| Code | Meaning |
|:-------------|:-----|
ComplexCyst | A 'complex' or 'complicated' breast cyst, refers to cysts that contain something besides clear fluid
ComplicatedCyst | A 'complex' or 'complicated' breast cyst, refers to cysts that contain something besides clear fluid
CystWithDebris | CystWithDebris
MicroCyst | A 'Microcyst' on the other hand, is very small, often less than 2-3 mm. They will only show up on a mammogram or ultrasound, and, they often occur in clusters. Breast clustered microcysts are quite common, estimated to appear in around 6%% of all breast ultrasound scans
OilCyst | Breast oil cysts are benign breast lumps that usually don't require treatment.
SimpleCyst | The cyst usually contains only fluid, and it is surrounded by a very thin wall.

concept.display: A 'complex' or 'complicated' breast cyst, refers to cysts that contain something besides clear fluid
A 'complex' or 'complicated' breast cyst, refers to cysts that contain something besides clear fluid

A 'Microcyst' on the other hand, is very small, often less than 2-3 mm. They will only show up on a mammogram or ultrasound, and, they often occur in clusters. Breast clustered microcysts are quite common, estimated to appear in around 6%% of all breast ultrasound scans
Breast oil cysts are benign breast lumps that usually don't require treatment.
The cyst usually contains only fluid, and it is surrounded by a very thin wall.
